basics.name: Moritz Tomasi
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: A full-stack developer with strong experience in front-end and back-end development, a variety of coding languages, frameworks, and technologies. A good communicator and a team player. Always willing to face new challenges and highly self-motivated.

work.summary: In 2018 I co-founded Findheim, a real-estate matching platform for properties to buy in Vienna. While my focus laid on the conceptualization, implementation and maintenance of back-end services, I also developed front-end features for users and internal tools:
highlights: Back-end stack: NodeJS, Typescript, Python, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Redis.
Front-end stack: HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Javascript, VueJS (NuxtJS), StimulusJS, Turbolinks, PugJS.
Conceptualization of a data pipeline for real-estate data that would process 80,000+ real-estate ads per day.

Conceptualization, implementation and maintenance of a data extraction service in a web-crawler that would extract data from crawled real-estate pages. Implemented using Python, Scrapy and semantic text analysis.
Conceptualization, implementation and maintenance of a geocoding service using TomTom Multinet data, NodeJS, Typescript, PostgreSQL and PostGIS.
Conceptualization, implementation and maintenance of a real-estate recommender system built with Elasticsearch.
Helped create and implement code quality standards by introducing code review processes, refactoring processes and code metrics.
Lead technical product management and implemented a product management process based on Basecamps book "Shape Up". Setup, managed and maintained planning tools like Trello and Notion.
Worked with freelancers on the implementation of mobile apps (iOS, Android).

work.summary: I worked as a full-time employee in a team of eight developers, focusing on both front-end and back-end:
highlights: Back-end stack: NodeJS, Coffeescript, Typescript, Python, Java, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Redis.
Front-end stack: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Angular.
Developed and maintained RESTful APIs in both NodeJS (ExpressJS) and Python (Django, Tornado), that delivered and processed data from Elasticsearch and PostgreSQL.
Conceptualized, implemented and maintained an image-caching service for large amounts of data.
Developed an image-matching service with Python and OpenCV.
Worked on user-facing front-end features and internal tooling with Angular and Bootstrap. Strong focus on mobile responsiveness and user experience.
Developed various metrics with Prometheus, Grafana and Kibana.

education.summary: Bachelor thesis and internship at the Institute for Interactive Media Systems on the subject "Clickless Smartphone Text Translator and Enricher". Developed an android app and web-service to extract, translate and enrich text from images, using Android SDK, Python and TesseractOCR.
